title: Inappropriate Content
learning_objectives: Learn to define the different types of inappropriate content (i.e., violent, sexual, hateful, extremist)
Understand the negative effect of inappropriate content on young people
Learn how to react to inappropriate content
main_messages: Exposure to inappropriate content can be dangerous for our physical and mental health
Reporting and blocking content to protect ourselves and the others
questions: What kind of inappropriate content they can find online?
Did they find any inappropriate content online? In what applications?
What do they do when they find online inappropriate content?

practical_examples.text: Teach and encourage students to report/block/hide inappropriate content they find online using the platforms settings and options

links.text: Is TikTok Safe for Kids? Here's What Parents Should Know

resources.text: Four ways to report inappropriate content online
